content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Burner inserters at (-6.5,-57.5), (-4.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system for ore movement

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles forming electricity network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Before placing entities, ensure the target location is clear of other entities
- The error "Cannot place burner-mining-drill at the target location - something is in the way" indicates overlapping placement attempt

### Errors when extracting items
- Cannot extract items that don't exist in the source inventory
- Verify the source contains the items before attempting extraction

### Resource management issues
- Multiple "out of fuel" warnings indicate need to better manage fuel distribution
- Ensure mining drills and inserters are kept supplied with coal

### System connection issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and engine
- Verify fluid systems are properly connected end-to-end
